      • getMaxWait

        public long getMaxWait()
        Max time to wait if the pool is waiting for a free object to become available before failing. Zero means don't wait

      • setMaxWait

        public void setMaxWait(long maxWait)
        Max time to wait if the pool is waiting for a free object to become available before failing. Zero means don't wait
